importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date when the incident occurred and the official announcement of Doug Martin's death was made by the Oakland Police Department and the media.
The date of Doug Martin's selection in the first round of the 2012 NFL draft as the 31st overall pick, marking the beginning of his professional career.
The date when Martin had a standout season with 1,402 yards and six touchdowns, earning him first-team All-Pro and Pro Bowl honors.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The period during which Doug Martin played professionally in the NFL, from his draft in 2012 to his retirement after the 2015 season, establishing his legacy as a top-tier running back.

keyTakeAways: Former NFL running back Doug Martin died after a brief struggle with police officers during an arrest in Oakland on Saturday.
Martin was involved in a break-in investigation, which led to his detainment and subsequent death in a hospital.
Martin, known for his time with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, had a career marked by 5,356 rushing yards and 30 touchdowns across seven seasons.
He was selected as one of the top 50 players in Tampa Bay Buccaneers franchise history, highlighting his impact and success in the NFL.
The Oakland Police Department and Mayor Barbara Lee expressed condolences, emphasizing Martin's ties to Oakland as a community member.
An autopsy will be conducted to determine the cause of death, which has not been released.
His family requested privacy during the grieving process.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Former NFL running back Doug Martin, known for his outstanding career with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, died after being arrested in Oakland during an investigation into a break-in. A brief struggle with police officers occurred during the detainment, after which he became unresponsive and later died in a hospital. Martin, selected 31st overall in the 2012 NFL draft, had a career that included 5,356 rushing yards and 30 touchdowns, earning him Pro Bowl and first-team All-Pro honors. The Oakland Police Department and Mayor Barbara Lee expressed condolences, and an autopsy is underway to determine the cause of death. The incident has sparked public attention on police interactions with individuals, particularly those with prominent public profiles and community ties.
title: Former NFL Player Doug Martin Dies After Struggle with Police in Oakland
